summary: They really made Spider Man the perfect millennial/gen z mood by having him be way in over his head most of the time, but it's...
body:
They really made Spider Man the perfect millennial/gen z mood by having him be way in over his head most of the time, but it’s fine cuz that’s just how it be sometimes in this bitch of a world.

I mean he even died. What a super hero for our generation.

summary: a concept: that opening scene from spider man: homecoming but instead of scrolling through unanswered messages he sent to happy,...
body: a concept: that opening scene from spider man: homecoming but instead of scrolling through unanswered messages he sent to happy, peter is scrolling through his chat with tony even though he knows tony will never respond to his messages cause he died to bring them all back from the soul stone. thats how spider man: far from home should begin

blog.name: austintrench
blog.title: Insane In The Brain.
blog.description: What ya see is what ya get!

summary: How uncle Ben died in the Mcu
body:
How uncle Ben died in the Mcu

My version of this would be simple. Before Pete got bit by the spider from Oscorp, he was little during the invasion of the first film and had a fight with his uncle who took him downtown that day to talk to him or chased him down because peter had a tantrum due to showing up someone in class and taking down a bully but being a show off and jerk about it. Peter snaps at uncle Ben and runs off crying as he gave Peter a good and calm talking to about the incident. The invasion then happens rubble killing everyone, rubble almost hits Peter before uncle Ben pushes him out of the way taking the rubble being crushed. Peter wakes up on the hospital with aunt may crying over him as he asks about uncle Ben she breaks down and he realizes what happened. Peter feels guilty deep down and feels like he was helpless to save him or anyone in trouble that day. He is then bitten by the spider, becomes the Spider-Man.


Now here comes the sad part.


Infinity war afterlife.


Peter wakes up there in a beach like place within the life stone, it’s lonely as someone appears behind him. The voice says “hey kiddo.”, Peter turns to see Uncle Ben as young as the day he died. Played by Toby maguire, Peter hesitated as the man put his hand on his shoulder talking about how big he got and then Peter in shock hugs him close beginning to bawl. They talk for a while and console until Peter is starting to fade again signifying he’s coming back to life. He struggles to grab uncle Ben screaming for him to come with him to come home. He says he can’t, but he does turn to Pete and says softly. “With great power…comes great responsibility, never forget that Pete. I love you son.” And with that Peter fades back to life with a tear. After beating up thanos he comes home and just hugs aunt may close just happy to have someone there.

blog.description:
one man's yeet is another man's yoink ~~me
i have the same name as an mcu character have fun guessing https://archiveofourown.org/users/Maine2

body:
Headcanon

  • Peter Parker talks a lot,
  • But people don’t really listen
  • Because he’s so young
  • So whenever Peter needs to vent and his friends aren’t around, he talks to the groups of adults who never hear any of it
  • But that rarely happens
  • Peter just likes to fuck around with them
  • See who’s actually listening
  • Adults: talking strategy and stuff
  • Peter: remember that episode of Big Time Rush where everyone but Kendall got Hollywood fever? Like, Guitar Guy used to be Cello Guy, and all the other band members became dicks, but Kenall still played hockey and that’s why he was okay? And how they cured everyone by having a snowball fight in the middle of LA?
  • Adults: talking about politics
  • Peter: hey would the hulk be able to eat Captain Americas shield like a potato chip?
  • Adults: arguing
  • Peter: quietly singing Take A Hint from Victorious
  • Sam and Bucky: straight up punching each other
  • Peter: god, that episode of iCarly where Carlys room burned down and she thought her whole life was ruined because of a gummy bear lamp? That made me cry
  • Oh yeah Peter also loved Nickelodeon shows
